Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Identified recurring activities within the same case, specifically 'Verify Documents' in C001 and C003 and 'Call Customer' in C002, based on their repeat appearance in individual case workflows.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Inferred that the contextual meaning of recurring activities differed based on their position in the workflow and the associated additional context provided in the log.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Formulated hypotheses that 'Verify Documents' in C001 and C003 could be separated into 'Initial Document Verification' and 'Re-Verification' due to their sequence and context, and that 'Call Customer' in C002 could be split into two types: investigation and follow-up.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Proposed new activity names for recurring events that reflect their contextual differences, such as renaming 'Verify Documents' to 'Initial Document Verification' or 'Re-Verification Following ID Scan Submission' based on the provided workflow details.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Cross-checked the sequence of events to confirm that the proposed renames aligned with the actual process flow and additional context provided for each activity.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Used heuristics like agent role (e.g., BackOfficeAgent, BranchOfficer) and event purpose (e.g., initial verification, follow-up) to improve the clarity and precision of the activity names.
